long_description: your life in provence is your real estate partner in lorgues. our philosophy is simple: to provide an excellent quality of service to our clients so that they are so satisfied that tell all their friends about us. only a relationship based on mutual interests and respect can achieve this. we are a real estate agency based in lorgues and surrounding villages, in the heart of beautiful provence. your life in provence would like to welcome you to our agency where you can find the real estate of your dreams in the lorgues area in the comfort of our warm and relaxed atmosphere of our office. our coverage area spreads around lorgues and the surrounding villages of flayosc, st antonin du var, les arcs, taradeau, villecroze et le thoronet. we can also help you further afield through our local partner agencies covering other surrounding towns. together we will define and search for the best property for you in lorgues and surrounding area. our aim is simple : to help your dreams come true and to maintain long term relationships with our clients. we are a « one stop shop », from translation to helping sort out utilities to finding caretakers and even putting you in contact with builders. for the sale of your property, villa or apartment you will benefit from our exclusive partners in england, holland, belgium and in norway.with your life in provence, let your dreams come true, we can help you
